item.title: Plantain Curry
item.description: Ingredients 2 plantains oil 3-4 scallions 1 yellow (bell) pepper 1 tbls. curry paste (yellow) 400 ml coconut milk 1 tbls. sugar 1 tbls. vinegar 4 tbls. fish sauce or veg alternative such as lupin sauce or plum sauce 3 cm ginger 1 tsp. coriander green lemon grass
